briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a user-defined divisor to scale display units on the value axis.

detaileddescription.para: The property is not supported by MS Office 2016 new charts. Default value is 1.
Setting this property sets the Unit property to Custom.

briefdescription.para: Returns the Document the title holder belongs.
Gets or sets the scaling value of the display units as one of the predefined values.
Provides access to the scaling options of the display units for the value axis.
